Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Southbound Reroute near Devon/Broadway
ShortDescription: SB 151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via: Devon, Broadway, Granville, and Sheridan, due to, street blockage, near Devon/Broadway.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via: Devon, Broadway, Granville, and Sheridan, due to, street blockage, near Devon/Broadway.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
